actions.name: Rime Tendril
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 4 (1d8) cold damage.

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: The rime worm grub can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Ravenous Larva
special_abilities.desc: The rime worm grub can make an opportunity attack against any creature that leaves its reach, even if the creature takes the Disengage action. In addition, it has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hp.

special_abilities.name: Snow Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: The rime worm grub has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in snowy terrain.

special_abilities.name: Snow Stride
special_abilities.desc: The rime worm grub can burrow through nonmagical snow and ice in addition to sand, earth, and mud. In addition, difficult terrain composed of snow or ice doesn't cost it extra movement.
